name: Regrets?
description:
Regrets is a text-based game about decisions. Sometimes there are opportunities to turn around what's been done, but other times, that just isn't possible. What will you do?

Controls :

a - Choice 1 (if on screen)

s - Choice 2 (if on screen)

d - Choice 3 (if on screen)

f - Turn the page (if on the screen)
